website_summaries.verdict: The Taos Freedom displays a street style sneaker look but surprises you with its foot support and superb comfort. Users with foot issues like Plantar Fasciitis and overpronation commended how the footbed helped in their condition. Unfortunately, some had problems with sizing and found out it fit smaller than expected but was quickly remedied by going half a size up. In the end, the pair's simple, laidback look of the shoe is what attracted the consumers, but the supportive and comfortable feel of the cushioning was what hooked them.
pros: Most of the users found the Taos Freedom to be very durable
Consumers with foot problems were pleasantly surprised that the kick's footbed provides excellent support, which aided in alleviating pain in their feet
It is easy to clean, based on a number of users' opinions
Several purchasers found this pair to be aesthetically pleasing
A few of the wearers were delighted that they receive compliments every time they wear the shoe out
The kick's materials and construction are deemed by most reviewers to be of excellent quality
Majority of the shoe users admired how comfortable this pair is and added that it is ideal for all-day wear
Some said that the leather upper correctly shape after their feet after a short break-in time
A good number of buyers said that its slightly high price is worth every penny
cons: Most of the purchasers mentioned that it ran smaller than usual
Some users griped about the squeaking sound the shoe produced

customer_reviews.title: Grey is more brown than grey.
customer_reviews.text: I was really expecting a better product from Taos. The fit is fine since I ordered a half size larger as was recommended in other comments. The insert isn't that good, very flimsy, & though the arch support is good, the foot bed part is very thin. You can feel pebbles & such thru it, going to put another insert on top & see if that helps. My main disappointment is with the color. I ordered grey & it's more of a taupe brown. I happened to be wearing brown shorts & a grey t-shirt when I got the shoes, so I'm sharing the picture so you can decide on the color yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow, these are even better than I’d hoped for. I had ordered the Capitol but it was really narrow and tight, awkward even. I already had these in red leather so I figured I’d try these again. Love them! The material they are made with is soft and supple and the metallic sheen is pretty without being ostentatious. The arch support is the best part though. This is my third pair of Taos cute sneakers and I love how they are not only cute but supportive and comfortable all at the same time. This taupe color will be so versatile too. Thank you Taos.
customer_reviews.author: E. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to comfort when standing in an office for long periods of time (and for mild walking around), Taos sneakers have been great for me. However, I've owned these less than two months and they are already coming apart. I can tell they likely won't last me past 6 months tops, which is (to me) unacceptable for this price. This isn't from intense use, just regular standing/walking in the office during the week. Additionally, the heels have squeaked loudly since day 1. Overall, while the comfort is good, the shoe quality does not match up to the price or the reputation of Taos, and I wish I hadn't missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Tarz

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes if you get your own insoles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes after reading the reviews. The others are correct that the insole is kind of hard and not very comfortable. So, I went to the drugstore and bought some foam shoe inserts. After removing the insoles that came with the shoes I experimented with various foam inserts and my own custom orthotics. Now they are wonderful. If you are willing to experiment with getting your own insoles these shoes are great. They are now very comfortable and fit perfectly. The sizing is good. I wear a 7.5 M and they fit like a 7.5 M.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Europe based on recommendation of a traveller on Pinterest who said she couldn't live without them for travel shoes. Even though I broke them in, they turned out to be uncomfortable at the end of a day of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Crime In Paris

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute shoes and I was disappointed that they didn't fit very well. I'm a 7 1/2, but ordered an 8 because I was told they ran small. The 8 didn't work either. The backs are cut very low and rubbed on my heels. The edge of the tongue in one shoe was rough and caused a sore spot on the edge of my foot. This was after wearing them only a few hours in the house. Cute shoes, but for the money they really should be better quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Margot Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Great show, wonderful arch support, but order 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking casual shoe with a wonderful arch support, but it does run small. I read the reviews, many suggesting that this shoe runs a bit small and to order a half size up. I didn't listen and ordered my regular size. Guess what, I should have ordered 1/2 size larger. So, I'm returning these and will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: misly

customer_reviews.title: Fun, comfortable, casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something not dressy or athletic to wear with jeans. Just love these and wear them constantly. My husband does not like them but what does he know??!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a lace up shoe in a brown shade and was delighted to find these. Taos is one of my favorite brands that I know will usually give me comfort and good arch support. Theses shoes did that for me. As the weather gets cooler these shoes will be a great addition to my fall wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: but I liked the fit so much that I wear them out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pair number two of the fashion sneakers. I got the first pair for an event, but I liked the fit so much that I wear them out and about a lot. I have a very high arch and in my case the high arch means I have a thick foot. These shoes have both things that are needed for me- 1. support beneath the arch 2. space in the shoe for the top of the arch. That is, often a shoe with good arch support will be much too tight on the top of my foot. These work.
customer_reviews.author: MMP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: Taos makes the perfect insole for me. I have some foot problems, and the insole is shaped in such a way that it provides support to all areas of the foot. In doing so, it evenly divides the pressure on my foot. In addition, I like the style. Since I have to wear sneakers often, that's important to me. Also, the leather is very soft! This is my second pair of leather Taos sneakers, and I have two other fabric pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Margie S

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent me the wrong size. I ordered a 10 and received a size 9. Very disappointing!! When I realized I had received the wrong size, they had sold out of my size. I love Taos Freedom sneaker , size 10 is a perfect fit and so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: bebeBar

customer_reviews.title: Look of the shoe-excellent.  Fit was still a little tight - loosen those shoelaces!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered up to a size 7, since I'm a 6/12. Fit lengthwise, but was still a little tight at the widest part the foot (the first metatarsals?) I loosened the shoelaces up all the way, to make the shoe slightly wider, and it worked. Just not as much shoelace to tie when you're finished. Love the look of the shoes - so different. Gotten several compliments already.
customer_reviews.author: AMO BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this product...disappointed. I did buy 1/2 a size larger than my normal size as other reviews indicated. The arch support was good; there is little to no cushion at the ball of your foot and toes. Even adding my own insert I felt there just wasn't enough cushion under my toes; can add just so much before the shoe gets tight. The heel sits low allowing the shoe to slip a bit. I am returning these and will continue my hunt for a decent, supportive pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Both comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Both comfortable and stylish. According to my physical therapist they are too flexible for my arthritic issues and I should wear a stiffer soled shoe. Nevertheless I will enjoy wearing these on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: enough to look good with jeans
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some kind of walking shoe that was not an athletic shoe. Dressy in a casual way....enough to look good with jeans, better slacks. It’s a feel good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I wear prescription orthotics for Morton's Neuroma, but I don't need them with the inserts in these shoes. I showed them to my foot Dr., and he liked them too. Every time that I see a pair on sale, I snatch it up.
customer_reviews.author: Denise in MA

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have both foot and knee problems and can only wear shoes that are comfortable and have a good arch. This is just one in a series of Taos brand shoes I've purchased over the years. I wear these everyday to walk my dog and knees and feet never hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Thriller-fan1224

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a gorgeous burgundy/red that will be perfect for fall and the holiday season. The support system in Taos shoes is very supportive for wide-ish feet with high arches (which is me!!). LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: they are perfect! This is a smart looking and very comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: I took other's suggestion and sized up a half size, they are perfect! This is a smart looking and very comfortable sneaker. Great arch support and Taos offers replacement footbeds for when they start to "break down". Highly recommend this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: bvogie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned this brand of shoe before but that will change for sure! These are unbelievably comfortable right out of the box. I'm taking them to Europe next month and plan to do a lot of walking, so they will be perfect! They are also really good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes I don't have to wear orthotics in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes I don't have to wear orthotics in them they have a good support. The design, fit and leather are great. The leather is soft, the red does bleed on white socks at first but it does wash out. I wear them all day and not foot problems.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Color selection means nothing
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy they will send anything even if not the sneaker you pick. Some sneakers have colored laces and other have white laces. So basically it will be whatever they have or feel like sending. The pictures of colors and options apparently mean nothing. Then I asked if I can just get the right color laces sent and I have to return the whole item. The Taos store is the same price and probably get what you order.
customer_reviews.author: angelique rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: I returned these sneakers they were too short I wear an 8.5 in most shoes but these ran small. There was no lining in side which I did not care for
customer_reviews.author: smokeyj

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! They felt good the minute I put them on. The finish is dressier than the moc shoes. The toe box seems slightly larger than other Taos shoes I have. A great fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.author: librarybee

customer_reviews.title: fancy feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, wish they were in the stores as they are so much cooler in person!
customer_reviews.author: ella

customer_reviews.title: As expected - great look; came with 2 sets of laces - b & w
customer_reviews.text: Having tried this on in the store, the ones that arrived were exactly as expected. Takes a bit to break into, but otherwise, comfortable and hip. These arrived just in time for my trip to Santa Fe and Taos, NM. These came with black laces already in, but with an additional pair of white laces as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Maria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe runs little larger than their boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love shoe still to large must return. Originally ordered 9 1/2 then ordered 9 still too large. The comfort of the shoe is fantastic and I loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 and Amazon recommended that I get a 9 and a 1/2 which I did and they fit perfect very comfortable great support I love the green
customer_reviews.author: QM

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe just did not look good on my feet. Looked very flat on the instep. However, overall it's a really cute shoe, the fit was good, possibly a bit wide for my slighlty narrow foot. I am a 10-10.5, often need an 11 in closed toe, and the 11 was correct for me. I think it would look cuter on a wider shorter foot. Seemed to have good support and cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Shashi4

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes. Wore them a full day teaching the first day with no problems. They are also cute as heck!!! I'm glad I didn't order a half size up as some reviewers recommended because my normal size 9 was perfect. I will definitely be getting another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Mag

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe; poor color description.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect except for the color! This shoe was supposed to be red. I think it’s more brownish than red. That is my only complaint. The color looked different online
customer_reviews.author: nut lover

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe in hopes of it being a light pewter. Actually almost a light black. Returned and ordered the grey which turned out to be brown. So sadly neither pair worked. However it is a gorgeous made shoe. But just didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2shop34

customer_reviews.title: I sized up half size the first time as that was recommended. The shoe was too big
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I ordered, I had to return the first. I sized up half size the first time as that was recommended. The shoe was too big! I found them to be true to size for my flat duck feet. I can't wait for summer, I plan to wear them with skirts! So cute.
customer_reviews.author: ChipHasSpots

customer_reviews.title: Greta looking
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker has nice support and is a good fit.The look of the sneaker is terrific,the metallic and grommets give it a very cool and expensive look
customer_reviews.author: stephanie feldman

customer_reviews.title: it's a shoe
customer_reviews.text: it's nice looking, comes with two different sets of laces, looks great with the new trend of skirts with tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: becki kain

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Style and quality seemed good however the size was too small. I have Returned
customer_reviews.author: Miss U

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Only complaint is no cushion on upper portion of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe and now have three pairs. They are very comfortable from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Gelvin

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe if it fits
customer_reviews.text: I should have sized down instead of reacting to encouragement to size up. Nice shoe if it fits. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: KatoKat

customer_reviews.title: Taos fashion sneakers shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Fits true to size. Feels like I'm walking on clouds. Love the arch support, design and color. Wasn't too sure about these shoes when I ordered them but now I'm thinking about getting a second pair in a different color. Best purchase in a while.
customer_reviews.author: cesar woore

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. When I wore them, my feet were comfortable all day. No blisters, a perfect fit. I got so many compliments because they are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: DLZ

customer_reviews.title: White is cream, not white.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the white is not white. It is most definitely cream. I have this shoe in canvas in the same size (8) and the leather fits better bigger. The 7 1/2 is no longer available so will put fillers under the insoles. I have somewhat narrow feet so have to do this often. Taos is the best for comfort so will put up with the color and fix the size.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Fun city sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these in pewter to wear while traveling since they have great arch support for long days of sightseeing and look equally good with jeans, capris and casual dresses.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Story of 2 sizes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered 1/2size up from my normal size which was too large, so I must return. Not convenient! I then ordered my normal size which fit perfectly. I bought 2 pairs of Pewter Leather Sneakers. Both pair have white laces. Sneakers are shown with grey/gray laces. I would like to have the grey laces for both pair. How can I obtain grey laces???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great. The foot bed is very comfortable with on ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great. The foot bed is very comfortable with on exception. For me though, there is little cushion for the ball of the foot. The heel area and arch are good. I needed to replace the footbed with another so I would also have cushion for the ball of foot. Other than that, they are excellent quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great to walk all day.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and a great color. There is no break in period. Great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Osteen

customer_reviews.title: These shoes look nice enough that I will probably wear them outside class
customer_reviews.text: I am not an athletic shoe wearer. I needed a shoe that would support my foot well for a tai chi class--and that they do.These shoes look nice enough that I will probably wear them outside class.
customer_reviews.author: McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them, they have great arch support and can be worn all day
customer_reviews.author: Ian Saunders

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a half size larger which is a good fit. The sole of the shoe is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger which is a good fit. The sole of the shoe is not as comfortable as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit well, and they look good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Vandusen

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding comfortable shoes so I'm thrilled to have success with an online order. I have two pair. The black is much softer than the brown leather. My laces are cream colored- not black as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Other than that these fit comfortably, not much more than an hour's break-in time ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to swap out the insole for a pair of Dr Scholl's Low Arch insoles, but I have to do that with other shoes as well. Other than that these fit comfortably, not much more than an hour's break-in time because of the soft leather. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Dappled

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stylish comfort shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, may take these to Europe this summer, great walking shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tervelt Bartels

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but too large
customer_reviews.text: Shoe didn’t fit correctly; too wide and long. Sole was very noisy when walking in the house.
customer_reviews.author: christine harris

customer_reviews.title: Great style!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of them! and I wished I could have kept them, but unfortunately they were a bit narrow right next to my bunion. I hated to return them!
customer_reviews.author: Looking4simple

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a half sz larger than normal. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half sz larger than normal. I have ordered this brand before and you do need that half size up. I am ordering another pair! Love them. Lots of support for high arch
customer_reviews.author: CAC

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit fine. Cushion not as comfortable as my other Taos ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine. Cushion not as comfortable as my other Taos shoes though. The white part of the shoes look as if someone rubbed shoe polish on them. Wondering if shoes had been returned. Not sure if I'll keep them. For what they cost not really thrilled they look dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Sasser

customer_reviews.title: Love my Taos!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not only extremely comfortable, but stylish too! So much, I bought 3 pair!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J Evans Coontz

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and these fit great. The arch support is great too. I normally can't wear this style shoe because usually they don't have any arch support, but these are great. My new favorite shoes! I bought pewter in size 10 and I usually wear a 10 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe but I would recommend ordering up a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but I would recommend ordering up a half size. I had to take the insole out and replace it with a thinner one for a looser fit.
customer_reviews.author: rmb

customer_reviews.title: I love the arch support and I can wear them all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Taos brand shoes. I love the arch support and I can wear them all day without pain. They are very attractive in an edgy sort of way and I wear them often.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So cute and so comfortable. I can wear these all day. I have picky constantly sore feet and these shoes work a treat. Always get compliments when I wear these. Look cute with dresses too.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Totally Comfortable Awesome Support!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! My second pair. Great for those with foot issues! I can wear them without my orthotics!!! I ordered them in white but they are NOT a true bright white, more of an off white cream color. However they are so comfortable the off white color is not an issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moss

customer_reviews.title: very good looking sneaker but way too narrow and the arch ...
customer_reviews.text: very good looking sneaker but way too narrow and the arch support is too big for such a small shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at its best
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this pair to women who are in need of a very comfortable pair of sneakers. The first time I wore them, I was on them pretty much all day and I felt nothing but comfort. I already ordered my 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.author: Gela

customer_reviews.title: ... was narrow and I am looking for cushy shoes like my teva sandals
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes but the toe area was narrow and I am looking for cushy shoes like my teva sandals. Haven't found yet
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Borlo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I now own 2 pairs of this shoe in different colors. They are very comfortable and have great support. They also look great on.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Duke

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to order shoes without trying them on, but the site suggested going up 1/2 size and so I did. The shoes fit and have arch support, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have had trouble with Planters Fasciitis in my feet. These shoes have great support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to make all the difference in how long and comfortably I can walk in them
customer_reviews.text: These run a tiny bit small but the footpad inside is going to make all the difference in how long and comfortably I can walk in them. Really like the look
customer_reviews.author: TauniPort

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous comfortable sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I have received many compliments on those beautiful brown sneaker shoes. I have worn them from day one without a problem at all. I am on my feet all day long and they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The color you receive may surprise you.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes (I have multiple colors). The color however was not as portrayed. I don’t know what I would call the color but blush is not it.
customer_reviews.author: robert l owen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, almost felt okay, but just not the right fit for my foot. I need a bit more room in the toe box. I really liked them, but had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Color?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the navy shoe and it looks grey to me! Can’t see any blue in the shoe at all. Not sure if it was put in the wrong box or what - will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, with a great arch
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, with a great arch. Love the color. I already have the canvas style, so I knew I would have to like the leather ones. I do wear a half size larger in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silver sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I only wore them once so far but they were comfortable with good support.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy Leather Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for cooler weather. They are so comfortable and attractive. Work well with jeans and casual dresses or skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Mason

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible sneaker! Fits like a glove and so stylish! Love this brand💖
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Taos shoes. I have some foot issues & these shoes are the best. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I now have two pairs and they are very comfortable to walk and stand in for long hours. Perfect for conferences!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Coulbourne

customer_reviews.title: I reccommend
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn them much but might like more padding under ball of foot
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable! I wore them all day right out of ...
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable! I wore them all day right out of the box. I work in Health Care and am on my feet all day. My feet were happy!
customer_reviews.author: JDawn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE <3
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these shoes! My first pair of Taos but I will be a repeat customer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have ordered so many different shoes and I'm so tired of having to send them back over and over because they do not fit right. I put these on and they fit perfect and they are so comfortable, I was actually screaming I'm so happy!!!!! My husband came out of his office to see what I was so happy about. I thought the price was kind of high but it's worth it for the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, well designed comfortable walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable stylish walking shoe. The leather is high quality and the arch support is great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tennert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but very snug!
customer_reviews.text: Hoping these will be able to stretch out enough for me to wear more.... I'm a size 10, and these babies are pretty snug. I'd say order a half size bigger....
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these, fit as expected with a great arch ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these, fit as expected with a great arch support. Color is more taupe than gray, however very neutral. Cannot wait to wear these.
customer_reviews.author: R L Gilles

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: originally ordered an 8.5 then returned it for a size 9. Get lots of compliments on the shoe. Very comfortable for work. Color goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: I have a pair of these shoes. Size 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of these shoes. Size 9 fits well and I can wear them all day. The pair I received was very different. One was a size 9 and the other was a size 8. Please check out what you are sending. I reordered them from another vender after sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: tinks

customer_reviews.title: I own these shoes in 4 colors in size 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: I own these shoes in 4 colors in size 7. I don't know why these are too small in size 7. I have to return or exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Apple

customer_reviews.title: Cutest shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support and fit!! My 4th pair of Taos Freedom!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem pretty flimsy too
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but barrow through the toes. They seem pretty flimsy too. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: KT 85254

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is my second pair of these shoes and I feel they are attractive and support my 'fussy feet'.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L.

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit and neat lines of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and neat lines of the shoe. The arch support is padded and makes a very comfortable fit
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Varner

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit! Great arch support. Very comfort from the first time I wore them!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy's Shoes

customer_reviews.title: CUTE STYLISH ORTHOPEDIC TENNIS SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a size 8 in these Taos leather tennis shoes instead of my normal size 7 in this brand so think of that if ordering. I've gotten compliments the few times I've worn them but they are very hot when worn in above 80 degree weather. I have very flat feet and these are great support for me but because of my flat feet and the say they move in shoes, I can't wear sock. That could be why they seemed so hot. I don't know. Bottomline, they are very stylish shoes for being orthopedics!
customer_reviews.author: RobynAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support...& stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Taos are great casual shoes. I would not be able to walk without them
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: I cannot give them a really bad review, I got a great deal and I ...
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews on the site when I found these shoes in the Amazon Warehouse, I was completely aware of their size problems when I ordered them. I cannot give them a really bad review, I got a great deal and I made the purchase for a pair of black sneakers to wear for short periods of time. But I am mentioning that this shoe is not sized as buyers are accustomed to, and full price purchasers should most definitely order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Paying Attention to the Actual Words

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I typically have to add orthotics to my shoes, even athletic shoes, but not with these. They are extremely comfortable and very cute. I like that the liner is completely removable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Williams

product_meta.title: Taos Womens Freedom Freedom
product_meta.description: The freedom to go anywhere and do anything is what this sneaker offers. Unbelievably soft leather, laces for a great fit, and remarkable comfort from the polyurethane Curves & Pods removable footbed with Soft Support, one of the most comfortable footbeds you will ever experience. With this kind of freedom, anything is possible.
feature_bullets: Curves & Pods removable footbed with Soft Support
